Unconscious

In this series, the artist explores the perception of emotions through his work with abstract forms. Via dynamic brushstrokes and an expressive manner, the artist conveys emotions such as joy, anger, passion, love, acceptance, restlessness, attraction, anxiety, frustration, excitement and enthusiasm.
